message.content:
cs.CR, cs.LO, cs.IT, cs.GT, cs.PL

This paper deals with information flow control, which is a topic in computer security (cs.CR). It also involves the study of protocol composition and its effect on information leakage, which falls under the category of logic in computer science (cs.LO). The paper also uses game theory to model the interaction between the attacker and defender, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT) and game theory (cs.GT). Finally, the paper discusses the use of probabilistic protocols, which is a topic in programming languages (cs.PL).
